name: Chinese Calculator
body:
iCalc
=====

A calculator to calculate Chinese!

You can input a Chinese math expression, i.e. "一加上二乘以三", and then get the result "七".

# Function

* iOS 7 only.
* Horizontal slip: switch between "Simplified Chinese", "Traditional Chinese" and "digit".
* Vertical slip: show/hide settings view.
* Double click screen: copy the result.

# Install

Open [http://www.pgyer.com/icalc](http://www.pgyer.com/icalc) in your iPhone's browser, click "install" button.

![Launch Image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zzp-me/icalc/master/images/screenshot-1@2x.png)

![Settings View](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zzp-me/icalc/master/images/screenshot-2@2x.png)

![Traditional Chinese](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zzp-me/icalc/master/images/screenshot-3@2x.png)

![digit](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zzp-me/icalc/master/images/screenshot-4@2x.png)
